A spectacular bicycle-tour of Oslo

Explore Oslo by bike

  • Join one of our guided bike-tours around the capital of Norway
  • There are many "hidden" treasures in the city, which are not accesable by car.

What to expect:

  • A tour with one of our professional tour guides
  • See and learn about several historical places of significance
  • Experience contemporary Norwegian culture
  • See some extraordinary architecture
  • Modern street art

  • We finish the tour at one of Oslo's oldest pubs for some food and reflections of the experience

How it works:

  • Find a tour you want to join
  • Borrow a bike, or bring your own
  • Meet up at Nationalteateret and of we go!

  • We have a selection of bikes that can be borrowed, you only pay a deposit!
